channel.title: Journey on Niko Okio
channel.description: Recent content in Journey on Niko Okio

item.title: Welcome to my journey
item.description: Hi there 👋🏻 I’m Niko and starting to build in public! This can be a scary step in the beginning, because everything you do will be judged by the public. But on the other hand you get a lot of valuable inputs and feedback along the journey. So it’s defenitly worth it! My Goal 🎯 for now is to launch 2+ Products in 2022, gain some customers that pay me and learn a lot of things on the go!
